name: Nature
conimmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: all those of the creature who summoned it

traits.name: The Law of Nature
traits.desc: Allies within 20 feet have advantage on all saving throws.

traits.name: Inexorable
traits.desc: The Inexorables are immune to any effects that would slow them or deny them actions or movement.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: Nature’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: * 3/day: banishment, counterspell

traits.name: By Will Alone
traits.desc: As a reaction to missing an attack, Nature makes a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a successful save, the original attack is successful.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Nature makes two slam attacks or makes one slam attack and casts banishment.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) force damage.
